participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with a koala on my ranch.
My favorite color is orange because it reminds me of Halloween and fall.
it s one of my favorite hobbies.
My four daughters are my pride and joy.
i enjoy deep sea diving.

participant_2.background:
I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten.
i work for an architect firm.
I went on a quilting retreat in the mountains with my friends.
i have an autograph collection with more than 2000 signatures.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

content.text: Hello there! How is your day going?
Hi, it is going well! Just finished a quilting retreat in the mountains.
Oh wow, that sounds so fun! I have always wanted to try quilting.
I really enjoy it. It is very relaxing.
I bet it is. I love to do things that are relaxing.
What are your hobbies?
I like to deep sea dive, and I love spending time with my four daughters.
Deep sea diving sounds amazing! I wish I could do that.
It is a lot of fun. I have seen some amazing things under the sea.
I bet you have. I have always wanted to see a whale.
I have seen whales a few times. They are amazing creatures.
I bet they are. I love animals.
Me too. They are so amazing.
I wish I could spend more time with my family. My work schedule is so hectic.
I understand. I work a lot too.
I do not have much time for hobbies.
I know how you feel. I wish I could do more of the things that I enjoy.
Maybe we can get together and quilt sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to learn more about quilting.
Great! We can exchange numbers and get together sometime soon.
Sounds good! I am looking forward to it.
